description: Another of the White Base`s crew of civilian recruits, Kai is a confirmed coward and cynic - the smart-mouthed black sheep of the White Base crew. While his fellow pilots are struggling to save the ship, Kai can often be found cowering behind them, or mocking them from the sidelines. Still, he`ll do his part when he must, and as the series continues Kai begins to understand what he and his comrades are fighting for.
name: Kai Shiden
